work.title: Senior Automation and Data Engineer
work.description: Responsible for the development of automation in application testing, automation of management processes and business integrations.

bulletPoints.text: Improved automated E2E and Unitary tests' reliability in 90%
Engineered a custom Business Integration tool, housing results of over 20k test executions.
Introduced and developed business automations, eliminating over 16 hours of manual weekly workload.
Developed an automated system to extract 5 different key business metrics from test data, improving traceability in over 100%.
Aggregated data from 4 multiple sources into a centralized and structured data system.
Delivered Machine Learning algorithms to predict future productive issues with 90% accuracy.
Modeled and programmed an in-house server system to manage the request, execution and reporting of tests.
Coordinated and executed the deployment of the in-house server system.
Introduced a technology-based recruitment strategy and onboarding, reducing the turnover rate by 70%.

work.title: Gradute program (Multiple positions)
work.description: Responsible for the E2E availability and integration of the cloud‑based TV service in the European markets, ensuring the quality and excellence. (Integration Engineer, Business Analyst, Project Manager)

bulletPoints.text: Led the technical deployment of the WebTV and Chromecast solution for 6 countries.
Led the technical integration of the TV Service in Albania.
Created a remote testing lab with automated physical testing for all 11 VTV markets.
Pioneered a feature delivery pipeline, reducing the time to market by 50% and clearing a 1-year-old backlog.
Developed a data‑driven audit procedure, reducing the required configurations by 40%.
Designed and managed the implementation of API unit testing  and reporting in all 11 VTV Markets.
Introduced several automated testing initiatives, improving testing coverage over 100%.
Built custom audit and migration tools,replacing 100% of previous manual tasks.

voluntary.title: Manager
voluntary.description: Managed the innovation department by recruiting members, managing the budget, and maintaining/improving the acceleration program.
voluntary.company: JUNITEC ‑ Júnior Empresas do Instituto Superior Técnico

bulletPoints.text: Led 4 multidisciplinary teams, providing them with guidance in technology and management.
Formed 9 external partnerships and assembled a network of 24 mentors for advisory in finance, legal, industry, and other.
Launched 4 start‑ups with a cumulative investment of 100k€.
Awarded with ”Most Entrepreneurial European JE”.
Awarded with ”Most Innovative JE in Portugal”.

voluntary.title: Hardware/Software Engineer
voluntary.description: Developed the Signal Processing, electronics, and Machine Learning aspects of the collaboration project with CEiiA.
voluntary.company: JUNITEC ‑ Júnior Empresas do Instituto Superior Técnico

bulletPoints.text: Wrote an unpublished scientific paper with the results
Led the monthly technology status meetings with CEiiA’s board.
Constructed a low‑budget driving simulation rig.
Programmed a controlled driving simulation environment for data gathering.
Engineered an EEG signal processing pipeline feature extraction
Awarded ”Project of the Year” in the Portuguese JE movement

voluntary.title: Tutor
voluntary.description: Helping kids by tutoring them on high‑school Math and University level C programming.

bulletPoints.text: Tutored 2 highschool students in Maths and 2 University students with programming.
Pass Rate of 100% and an average grade improvement of 40%.
